start.text: Greetings, traveler. Care to trade? I have goods from all over.

choices.text: [Persuasion] You wouldn't happen to have anything... special, would you?

trade.text: Take a look. I assure you, my prices are fair.

neutral_response.text: Safe travels, then. Watch out for bandits.

special_goods.text: Heh, you've got a good eye. I keep the best for discerning customers. Here, take a look at my private stock.

hostile_response.text: Junk? I'll have you know my goods are of the finest quality! Now get out of my sight!

end.text: Come back if you need anything.
